description: A string is a valid parentheses string (denoted VPS) if and only if it consists of "(" and ")" characters only, and: We can similarly define the nesting depth depth(S) of any VPS S as follows: For example,  "", "()()", and "()(()())" are VPS's (with nesting depths 0, 1, and 2), and ")(" and "(()" are not VPS's.
